attributes.action: compel Michael Martin to resign as Speak of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr. Martin brings shame on his office, using the police as an instrument of his party rather than the state, and Great Britain deserves better.

For those who want to know more, just put "Michael Martin Speaker" into www.google.com

This is not out of the remit of the Government or Prime Minsiter, and this is an appropriate forum

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
